title:
The federal Pension Benefit Guaranty Corp fiduciary funds set-up?  



When a bankrupt corporation turns over it\'s underfunded pension(s) to the PBGC; are those specific pension funds maintained separately, or co-mingled with all pension funds?  



If co-mingled, does that mean if one falters or fails; they all do? If not co-mingled, does that mean a better funded company pension will not fail  when a poorly funded one does?
text:
Unfortunately, we won't be able to answer your question. The focus
of MyReporter.com is on local people, places and events.
